text: Piptostigma fugax is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is found in Ivory Coast, Ghana, and Liberia. It is threatened by habitat loss.Hawthorne, W. 1998. Piptostigma fugax. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
